formattedAddress: 3 Park Ave #34, New York, NY 10016, USA
adrFormatAddress: 3 Park Ave #34, New York, NY 10016-5902, USA

originalText.text: POOR.  I'm livid.  I have seen so many clients attracted to the selection provided by this textile firm and have always been impressed but this order I made  - the service has really soured my experience.  We ordered little after noon on the 16th of last month and had already verified that the material was in stock and had made payment as well.  This fabric did not leave til yesterday.  Thats little more thank 2 weeks waiting for a fabric that was in stock and that we had paid for.  "DESI" is incompetent.  I rely on the estimations provided by my vendors and base what I am given to make projections for my clientele.  There are so many other textile firms to choose from with that price point - I wont waste my time being put in anxiety over something that someone should have been on top off.  On to the next textile firm.

originalText.text: Jennifer Mary Munich works there, she has scammed people from Amscan.  Just got into sales. Not very good.
